title: Kevin Hall
description: A dialogue practicing vocabulary and phrases related to skin conditions, symptoms, and their characteristics in a medical context

conversation.teacherApp: Say "Ready to practice" to begin your medical English session!
Greet your patient warmly: Доброго ранку, пане Холл.
You ask about visit: Що привело вас сьогодні?
Patient hesitates explaining: Ну...розумієте, лікарю, у мене ці головні болі...
conversation.expectedResponse: Well, you see, doctor, I've been having these headaches...

conversation.teacherApp: You probe further: І як довго вони вас турбують?
conversation.expectedResponse: And how long have they been bothering you?

conversation.teacherApp: Patient recalls timeline: Ну, вони почалися приблизно три місяці тому.
conversation.expectedResponse: Well, they started about three months ago.

conversation.teacherApp: You assess location: Яка частина голови болить?
conversation.expectedResponse: Which part of your head is affected?

conversation.teacherApp: Patient points showing: Це прямо навпроти, ось тут.
conversation.expectedResponse: It's right across the front here.

conversation.teacherApp: You request details: Можете описати біль?
Patient describes sensation: Це такий тупий, пульсуючий біль.
conversation.expectedResponse: It's a sort of dull, throbbing kind of pain.

conversation.teacherApp: You check timing: Біль з'являється в якийсь конкретний час?
conversation.expectedResponse: Does the pain appear at a specific time?

conversation.teacherApp: Patient mentions pattern: Зазвичай гірше вранці, коли прокидаюся.
conversation.expectedResponse: It's usually worse in the morning when I wake up.

conversation.teacherApp: You explore relief: І чи є щось, що полегшує біль?
conversation.expectedResponse: And is there anything that make the pain better?

conversation.teacherApp: Patient shares solution: Якщо я приляжу на деякий час, це проходить.
conversation.expectedResponse: If I lie down for a while, it goes away.

conversation.teacherApp: You check other symptoms: Чи було щось ще, окрім головного болю?
conversation.expectedResponse: Has there been anything else besides the headache?

conversation.teacherApp: Patient mentions observation: Дружина каже, що я, здається, глухну.
conversation.expectedResponse: My wife says that I seem to be getting deaf.

conversation.teacherApp: You suggest examination: Думаю, я почну з того, що перевірю ваші вуха на наявність вушної сірки.
conversation.expectedResponse: I think I'll start by checking your ears for wax.

conversation.teacherApp: Well done, that's all for today's lesson, say "finish" to end the lesson.
